title: Video game industry 's wealthiest entrepreneurs 2016
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Entrepreneur (company), and a y axis representing Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Ma_Huateng_(Tencent) where Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is 21.9.
The lowest category is found at Kim_Jung-Ju_(Nexon) where Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is 3.5.
